    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(BibliographicProduct product)
      This function adds a BibliographicProduct to a library matrix and creates a new page if the current page is full.
      Parameters:
      product - an instance of the BibliographicProduct class that needs to be added to the library.

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(String productID)
      This function deletes a product with a given ID from a library and returns true if the product was found and deleted.
      Parameters:
      productID - a String representing the ID of the product that needs to be deleted from the library.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a boolean value indicating whether or not a product with the given productID was found and deleted from the library.

    • sizeOfAMatrix

      public int sizeOfAMatrix(int position)
      The function returns the number of non-null elements in a matrix stored in a specific position of a library.
      Parameters:
      position - The position parameter is an integer value representing the index of a matrix in a library.
      Returns:
      The method `sizeOfAMatrix` returns an integer value which represents the number of non-null elements in a two-dimensional array of `BibliographicProduct` objects.

    • getProduct

      public BibliographicProduct getProduct(String productID)
      This function searches for a BibliographicProduct in a library by its ID and returns it.
      Parameters:
      productID - a String representing the ID of the product being searched for in the library.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a BibliographicProduct object.

    • hasProduct

      public boolean hasProduct(String productID)
      The function checks if a product with a given ID exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      productID - A String representing the ID of a product.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether a product with the specified productID exists in the system.

    • showMatrix

      public String showMatrix(int currentPage)
      The function displays a matrix of bibliographic products with their IDs and page numbers.
      Parameters:
      currentPage - The current page of the library matrix being displayed.
      Returns:
      The method `showMatrix` returns a string that represents a matrix of bibliographic products in the library, with their IDs displayed in the corresponding cells. The string includes row and column headers, as well as empty cells represented by "---". The specific matrix displayed depends on the `currentPage` parameter passed to the method.

    • amountOfBook

      public int amountOfBook()
      This function counts the number of books in a library represented as a 3D array.
      Returns:
      The method `amountOfBook()` returns an integer value which represents the total number of books in the library.

    • amountOfMagazines

      public int amountOfMagazines()
      This function counts the number of magazines in a library represented as a 3D array.
      Returns:
      The method `amountOfMagazines()` returns an integer value which represents the total number of magazines in the library.

    • sortLibrary

      public void sortLibrary()
      The function sorts a library by calling another function to sort each individual material in the library.
